data.name: PasswordResetEmailBody
data.value:
Hello {0},
A password reset was requested at {1}.
Please go to the following URL to proceed with the reset. You can safely ignore this e-mail if you didn't request this.
{2}

data.name: ChangeEmailBody
data.value:
Hello {0},
An e-mail change was requested at {1}.
Please go to the following URL to proceed with the change. If you changed your mind, you can safely ignore this e-mail.
{2}

data.name: AccountCreationEmailBody
data.value:
Hello {0},
A account was created at {1} using this e-mail.
Please go to the following URL to set-up your password. If you didn't request this account, you can ignore this e-mail.
{2}
